title: Is it me or is Oceania server so laggy at night?
body: During the day i get around 30 ping, all of a sudden at around 7-9pm AEST, huge ping spikes at around 1200 ping. It really stuffs me up whenever i wanna play.....

replies.body: EDIT: My ping throughout the day is 10-20 on speedtest.com and get 80mbps download, 10mbps upload. Its the servers...
